name: Splice Framework
short_description: The Splice framework is designed to be extensible but also solid in structure. It allows you the ability to add external PHP class resources and work with them through the framework with with out having to change any code with in the class. The the progress of the development of Splice is still in it Alpha stage. If you have any suggestions on any how you think this framework can be improved contact me. I am hoping to have other PHP developers join me in create Splice. The base reason for the creation of Splice is the build a solid framework that adheres to the M-V-C pattern but also remains open and extensible to the developer using it.
